title: Fix failing test suite
description:
**As a** Consoul development team
**I want** all failing tests to be fixed
**So that** we can ensure code quality and prevent regressions

**Context:**
The test suite currently has approximately 130+ failing tests out of 1970 total tests. These failures are grouped into 8 categories for parallel resolution by multiple agents.

**Technical Notes:**
- Total tests: 1970
- Failing tests: ~130+
- Failure rate: ~6.6%
- Grouped into 8 independent work streams for parallel fixing

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** the complete test suite is run
**When** all sub-tickets are resolved
**Then** all 1970 tests should pass

**Sub-tickets will cover:**
1. AI Module - ConversationHistory token limit tests (3 failures)
2. AI Module - Provider initialization and mocking tests (35 failures)
3. AI Module - Persistence and session tests (7 failures)
4. CLI Module - ChatSession integration tests (5 failures)
5. CLI Module - Stdin handling tests (5 failures)
6. CLI Module - Model parameter validation tests (5 failures)
7. TUI Module - App initialization tests (4 failures)
8. TUI Module - Widget component tests (~70 failures)

**Testing Considerations:**
- Each sub-ticket is independently testable
- Groups are designed for parallel work without conflicts
- All tests must pass before closing this parent ticket
